content: the **citrus fruits granny square** is part of the tutti frutti granny square collection chose your favorite yarn color and turn this pattern into a lemon an orange a lime or a grapefruit *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** 4 5-mm e/4 usa 9 uk hook aran 4 medium weight yarn tapestry needle **yarn** i used paintbox yarns cotton aran in the following colors **a** buttercup yellow 623 **b** champagne white 603 **c** vanilla cream 608 **size** 4 10 cm **gauge** 4 rounds of a granny square in 4 10 cm **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
